website_summaries.verdict: The great feel of a waterbed sleep, but even more comfortable.
pros: Includes several layers of padding for extra lumbar support
Cuts down on the waves considerably, but still gives you a gentle effect
Movement from one side is hard to notice on the other side
cons: Not as many waves as a traditional water bed, but this mattress still has a wave effect

customer_reviews.title: Got a leaker and now what to do?
customer_reviews.text: Poor product, poor quality control and poor performance on the sellers part. I purchased a Queen Size 60 x 84 Waveless Waterbed Mattress Boyd Lumbar Supreme on April 7 and received it April 11. It was a week or so before I installed and filled the bed. The nest week my wife found a leak at a seam that was not made properly. Contacted the seller via Amazon and received a message on May 1 that a replacement mattress would be shipped. As of June 13 I still have not receive a replacement mattress. Attempting now to get assistance from Amazon. - Edited down my original review to fit Amazon guidelines.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: the mattress had a bad seam.
customer_reviews.text: ordered this in mid January.. 7 days after due was told to reorder. so i did this time I paid for 2nd day delivery.. 4 days past expected time was told to reorder..it comes.. spent all day getting everything ready it install my new mattress.. start filling and notice water pouring into the liner.. the mattress had a bad seam.. yes i have pictures.. I went to voice my rage when i discovered the tracking numbers was from the first one.. since i was told to donate or give the other away if it showed up I was ok knowing another was coming.. this has been 11 days ago and I am very dissatisfied with what I have
customer_reviews.author: Randall Keller

customer_reviews.title: Leaked at top seam but OK mattress if you are willing to patch.
customer_reviews.text: Had to patch 2 holes (at top of corner seam). No plastic odor. Didn't fill full which I think helps keep it from getting too wavey. Does have a pro-rated warranty so if it leaks again I'll probably send it back. If not for the leaks, I would give it a 5. Only 1 bottle of water conditioner. Shipping was very quick and packaging was excellent. This is second review-first did not show up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hickenbottom

customer_reviews.title: No waves !
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a real bed , after 20+ years my old water bed started too leak , this one is noise free and no waves , like the old one and it had chambers , still had waves , this one is more solid . I only got 1 bottle of the conditioner , said 3 , but it did come with a vent hookup , that was not shown .
customer_reviews.author: William E Cowles

customer_reviews.title: Stuck with it
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd waterbed. Quality was much poorer than our last 2 and was more expensive. Sold as waveless but had less than half the internal padding as the other brand. How do you return a waterbed? You dont.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: What a great change from out WAY old outdated waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this mattress a lot! There is really no wave to it, which is what I was looking for. My husband gets in and out of bed and I don't even know it. What a great change from out WAY old outdated waterbed mattress. I recommend this one and also the seller. The item was received quickly and in perfect condition. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nearly 0 motion in the ocean!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I had been without my waterbed for several years. My old bed was free flow. This is all the benefits of a warm bed without the waves. High quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: recieved matress in good shape only recieved one bottle of conditioner advertised as ...
customer_reviews.text: recieved matress in good shape only recieved one bottle of conditioner advertised as 3will let you know in a month have used waterbeds since 1978
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Improvements
customer_reviews.text: It had been a long time since I replaced my waterbed mattress. The Boyd waveless is very comfortable and even more stable than my prior waveless.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R. Reinke

customer_reviews.title: This is the waterbed mattress you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Been sleeping on a waterbed since 1976. Been on this mattress for about 2 weeks now. This mattress is relatively firm and practically motionless. Feels like lying on gel. Partner's back pain from sleeping on a too soft waterbed is gone. Seams are reinforced. This is simply the best waterbed mattress I've ever owned. Didn't get a hose attachment for the bed, but chances are you already have a couple of those. Shipping was VERY quick, within a week!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Welcome upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress! Such a welcome change/upgrade from the old one! Firm, but comfortably so, mostly waveless so my hubby & the doggies don't wake me when they all come to bed...LOL
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The water bed mattress leaked not happy we had a mess to clean
customer_reviews.author: gloroa

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this product and will never recommend this to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had waterbeds for many years. This one is not true to the description. It is NOT waveless. I am very disappointed with this product and will never recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Madan R.

customer_reviews.title: Mattress seems fine overall. It does NOT seem to be as ...
customer_reviews.text: Mattress seems fine overall. It does NOT seem to be as motion reduced as it states. I previously had a 90% reduced waves and it had significantly less motion than this one. The mattress also seems overly large. I have a standard frame that presumably should fit, but if I filled this one all the way, it would be significantly above the top of the frame. Seems durable, packaging was intact, came with one bottle of conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I've had so far. Very easy to set up, the baffles were in place ( sometimes they shift in transit). My cons: only got the one bottle of conditioner ( like the others I was promised 3 more) and that the fill point on the mattress is a tad flimsy and leaks when you burp it. ( more than it should).
customer_reviews.author: LAcy B

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a full motion mattress for over 30 years. It was to the point where we were shopping for other types of mattresses because of back pain, but didn't want to loose the waterbed. We were not sleeping well and were constantly moving around trying to get comfortable. The first night on the new bed, I slept the whole night through and woke up without backpain! I love this mattress. We still have the nice warm bed to get into, but have more support. It was easy to set up and had a commection for our faucett that allowed us to fill it with warm water. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Really like the matress good water bed for good price
customer_reviews.text: Really like the matress good water bed for good price. Would have given it 5 stars but picture is misleading. Top of matress is not quilted and only came with one bottle of conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I just wanted to say what a great mattress this is
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write product reviews. I know, I should, but I just wanted to say what a great mattress this is. I have slept on a regular waterbed for the last 30 years. The waves, or lack of support never really bothered me, I guess I got used to it or something. I thought that I would like to try a waveless mattress, and so after a lot of looking online, I settled for this one. I have to say that it has changed everything! This mattress is so much more comfortable than the old ones, you can't really compare them. Every night, I am grateful that I bought it. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable to sleep on and I'm quite pleased
customer_reviews.text: I installed thislast night after retiring my mattress of 20+ years. It is mostly wave free as described so I'm not sure of the issues that some of the other reviewers have. It is very comfortable to sleep on and I'm quite pleased. Movement on one side of the bed is barely noticeable on the other. I've had the mattress for a year now and have no complaints. It is holding up well, no leaks or other issues and is still pretty much wave free as when it was first installed.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as waveless as I'd like, but is plenty comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: Best waterbed mattress ever. I've had many of these through the years, this is the best by far. Most waveless of any I've seen.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mattress
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible mattress. I thought it would be great because it had on the lumbar support and everything but it turns out that this is so far from being any kind of waveless mattress and it made my back hurt more then my old bed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Reschke

customer_reviews.title: Waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.text: Posted for liner what I should have posted here. Mattress is comfortable, came with all parts advertised including hose attachments and conditioner. Mattress is a little wavier than my last mattress and the new plastic smell took a few days to dissipate. All in all I'm happy with the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Post man didn't like to lug it to the door but I really ...
customer_reviews.text: Post man didn't like to lug it to the door but I really enjoy the comfort. I would recommend getting a heater pad and replace it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not waveless
customer_reviews.text: Compared to our old bladder the comfort level of this bed is a 10 out of 10. However if you are looking for this bed to be waveless, keep looking. I can still feel every move my husband makes and vice versa. However, it's a waterbed and to me, that is to be expected to a degree. Comfort level is more important to us and let me be clear, this bed is COMFORTABLE! My husband has a lot of issues with his back and he hasn't woken up once in 3 weeks complaining of issues of back pain due to the way he slept.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Greene

customer_reviews.title: Truly waveless waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.text: I've slept in the same hard-side waterbed frame for the past four decades, and this is the third mattress I've bought. It is by-far the firmest, most-comfortable, most-waveless waterbed mattress I've slept on. I can roll over or get out of bed without disturbing my wife's sleep, and I can't say that about any waterbed mattress I've slept on before.
customer_reviews.author: Logan3-1639

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!  Do not buy Boyd!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy a mattress made by Boyd. I've had it less than a year and it's already leaking!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Boelter

product_meta.title: Queen Size 60 x 84 Waveless Waterbed Mattress Boyd Lumbar Supreme
product_meta.description: This ultra motionless waterbed mattress is meant to be used with a hard side waterbed frame. The mattress evenly distributes your weight. Has long-lasting virgin vinyl with a vacuum molded top thick reinforced 4-layer corners, plus additional three layers of lumbar fiber. Includes (3) 4 oz bottles of conditioner and (1) fill kit

4 Layer wave reduction system, approximately 99% motion reduction
Vacuum Molded Impression Top Sleep Surface
